title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\Admin\V2\ColumnFamily
name: ColumnFamily
description:
A set of columns within a table which share a common configuration.

Generated from protobuf message google.bigtable.admin.v2.ColumnFamily

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data

params.name: data.gc_rule
params.description: Garbage collection rule specified as a protobuf. Must serialize to at most 500 bytes. NOTE: Garbage collection executes opportunistically in the background, and so it's possible for reads to return a cell even if it matches the active GC expression for its family.
